files.name: dialog-description.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { Dialog as DialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  class: className,
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<DialogPrimitive.Description
	bind:ref
	class={cn("text-sm text-muted-foreground", className)}
	{...restProps}
/>
